name: ABRAMS, INC., Appellant, v. The REDEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA
name_abbreviation: Abrams, Inc. v. Redevelopment Authority of Philadelphia

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: ABRAMS, INC., Appellant, v. The REDEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM
The appeal is dismissed having been improvidently granted.
NIX, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Herbert S. Levin and Alex Satinsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Francis J. Moran, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
426 A.2d 91
ABRAMS, INC., Appellant, v. The REDEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1981.
Filed March 13, 1981.
Herbert S. Levin and Alex Satinsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Francis J. Moran, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
